AND fav.name LIKE CONCAT('%', #{pagination.keyword}, '%')

SELECT fav.id, fav.user_id, fav.prod_id, fav.creation_date, fav.snapshot_id, IFNULL(prod.name, fav.name) `name`, IFNULL(prod.description, fav.description) `description`, IFNULL(IFNULL(prod.sale_price, prod.list_price), fav.price) `price`, m.media_id, m.title, m.path FROM FAVOURITE fav LEFT JOIN PRODUCT prod ON fav.prod_id = prod.product_id LEFT JOIN MEDIA m ON fav.snapshot_id = m.media_id WHERE fav.user_id = #{userId}
AND fav.name LIKE CONCAT('%', #{pagination.keyword}, '%')
